ProcessPage.title: Process
ProcessPage.og_description: KONDAX's process - Learn about our development process.

intro.title: Co-creating outcome-driven development
intro.description: With a build-then-improve approach, we build resilient systems. Start small, validate impact, and safely scale only what works — crafting the right solution together as your business grows.

discover.title: Discovery & Problem Finding
discover.p1: Tell us your pain points and goals. We observe real operations on-site to find time sinks and common error points.
discover.p2: We quantify wasted time and cost (e.g., ‘3 days/month reporting’, ‘5 missed order checks/month’) and prioritize the highest-impact fixes.
discover.p3: We provide a proposal that clarifies ROI (e.g., ‘Invest ¥X → save Y hours/year, cut ¥Z cost’). If impact is unlikely, we’ll say so honestly.

build.title: Build & Improve Cycle
build.p1: We use a ‘start small, grow big’ approach. Ship core features in 1–2 weeks, validate usability and impact with actual usage, and quickly refine.
build.p2: Unlike big-bang plans, we welcome course changes. We respond within 24 hours and keep the system optimal for ‘now’.
build.p3: We demo working software every two weeks and review results numerically so you can feel the impact of your investment.

i1.label: Confidence
i1.body: Daily updates and 2-week reviews make spending transparent.

i2.label: Flexibility
i2.body: Adapt to changes and new ideas without extra cost.

i3.label: Early impact
i3.body: See benefits from week one and scale with confidence.

i4.label: Lower risk
i4.body: Start small to avoid big failures and fix issues early.

deliver.title: Launch & Impact Review
deliver.p1: We start with a trial period using real data, let your team get comfortable, then go live.
deliver.p2: Post-launch, we provide 24h support for issues like outages or how-tos so your operations never stop.
deliver.p3: We measure impact with numbers (hours saved, cost reduced, revenue up) and propose further improvements if needed.
